title: Cannot open chests and orbs
body:
So last few hours now I've been trying to open the chests and orbs i purchased and i just cant get it to work. I can get into the loot page just fine but when i select the orb/chest it doesn't open up the whole unlock chest thing.
I dunno does anyone know how to fix this?
ive been restarting the client and i troubleshooted it a few times, also completely restarted my laptop

replies.body: Change the client to low spec mode and you can open it. I just did it and it worked. Hope it works for you too.
